about_the_game:
Become the VR BOSS or Join the Epic Battle as a PC Player


Get ready for some wild fun in BOSS FIGHTERS! As a VR player, you become the mighty Boss with mega powers in a futuristic arena. Feel the rush of manipulating the environment and battling against a team of cunning PC players. If you're on the PC, you'll need strategy, agility, and teamwork to take down the colossal Boss. It's a clash of titans and tactics, where every move counts. Are you ready to dominate as the Boss, or will you join forces with others to bring down the giant? Jump into the madcap battle world of BOSS FIGHTERS!

Asymmetrical Multiplayer Battles

In VR, embody the Boss, where you get to play around with the game environment and show off your might. Manipulate the environment and engage in direct combat, offering a sense of power and scale as you tower over PC opponents.



And if you're on the PC team, it's all about working together, being quick and smart to beat the big VR Boss. Team up, make a plan, and use your skills to win. It's a fun mix of brawn and brains, perfect for an exciting gaming session!

Weapons & Gadgets Arsenal

As the VR Boss, you'll get your hands on awesome, physics-based weapons that feel real and powerful. They're not just cool, they pack a serious punch!



And if you're a PC player, there are a whole bunch of cool weapons and gadgets to choose from.



No matter if you're in VR or on PC, get set for action-packed, super fun battles. Every fight's unique and thrilling, a perfect mix of high-octane action and clever strategy!

Physics-Based Combat and Environment Interaction

Experience a new level of engagement with physics-driven gameplay. As the VR Boss, you'll feel like you're really there, messing around with everything in the arena in the most realistic way. Meanwhile PC Fighters use the environment strategically to gain advantages in combat.This physics-driven gameplay brings everything to life, making every move and strategy super important and a ton of fun.

Interactive Streaming and Community Engagement

BOSS FIGHTERS isn't just about playing – it's about watching too! The game has super cool streaming features. So, if you're watching, you get to be part of the action by actually influencing the match flow. It's like you're there, but from the comfort of your screen, making the whole thing more lively and interactive. Whether you're in the game or cheering from the sidelines, you're a big part of the fun!

Extensive Customization and Progression

In BOSS FIGHTERS, you get to make your character totally yours. Mix and match from a bunch of customization options. Upgrade your weapons, boost your abilities, and style up your character as you move up in this cool future-themed gladiator challenge. It's all about making your mark and standing out in the arena!

name: BOSS FIGHTERS

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.0GHz CPU Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050 or Radeon RX570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: HTC Vive (all models), Valve Index, Pico Neo 2, Oculus Quest 1/2 (using Oculus Link), Windows Mixed Reality headsets
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core 3.5GHz CPU Intel or AMD
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2060, Radeon RX 5600XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: HTC Vive (all models), Valve Index, Pico Neo 2, Oculus Quest 1/2 (using Oculus Link), Windows Mixed Reality headsets

short_description: BOSS FIGHTERS is a co-op arcade shooter where strategy and creativity meet wild fun. Battle as the towering Boss or team up as agile Fighters in fast-paced arena combat. Will you dunk your enemies in toxic lava or knock them out with a giant rubber duck?
supported_languages: English, French, German, Arabic, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Japanese
